brief.objetivo: Mostrar conforto e estilo do novo Air Max para jovens urbanos

concept.narrative_arc: Hook -> Build -> Benefit -> Proof -> Build -> CTA

shots.description: Close-up do tenis Nike Air Max girando 360 graus
Pessoa caminhando com o tenis, foco nos pes

Lineup de 3 colorways do Air Max

Amortecimento Air para o dia todo
Garanta o seu por apenas quinhentos e noventa e nove reais

prompts.prompt: Slow orbit shot: Cinematic 4K quality, professional studio lighting. Nike Air Max 2024 sneaker rotating smoothly on pristine white surface. Shallow depth of field, dramatic rim light, high-end commercial aesthetic.
prompts.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted, artifacts, cluttered background

prompts.prompt: Tracking shot: Cinematic 4K quality, natural daylight. Person walking confidently on urban sidewalk wearing Nike Air Max. Focus on feet and sneakers. Golden hour lighting, lifestyle aesthetic.
prompts.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted faces, unnatural movement

prompts.prompt: Macro shot: Cinematic 4K quality, soft diffused light. Extreme close-up of Nike Air Max sole compressing during step. Visible air cushion technology. Slow motion, detail-focused.
Medium shot: Cinematic 4K quality, warm interior lighting. Young person smiling contentedly, looking down at their Nike Air Max sneakers with approval. Cozy, satisfied expression.
Crane down shot: Cinematic 4K quality, studio lighting. Three Nike Air Max sneakers in different colors arranged elegantly. High angle looking down, premium product showcase.
prompts.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, uneven lighting, cluttered

prompts.prompt: Slow zoom in: Cinematic 4K quality, premium studio lighting. Nike Air Max 2024 centered in frame with Nike swoosh logo visible. Clean background, heroic low angle, high-end commercial finish.
prompts.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, distorted logo, cluttered background
